summary: New Nordic dungeon held by a group of cutthroat bandits.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/ravenbeak_banner1.jpg[/img][/center]


[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_description2.jpg[/img]

Kolov, a ruthless skooma addicted bandit and his gang of plunderers have taken refuge in the fabled Nordic ruin known to the locals of The Rift as RavenBeak Barrow. While digging through the rubble they found something unexpected... An area of the ruin untouched by the living for centuries. Follow in their footsteps and find out what happened at RavenBeak Barrow!

 [img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_install2.jpg[/img]

Copy all contents of the .rar into your skyrim DATA folder.

[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_uninstall2.jpg[/img]

Delete ravenbeakbarrow.ESP from your skyim DATA folder.

[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_changelogs2.jpg[/img]

[b][color=\"#FF0000\"]Version 1.0[/color][/b]
- Initial Release
[b][color=\"#FF0000\"]Version 1.1[/color][/b]
- Changed Interior Lighting
[b][color=\"#FF0000\"]Version 1.3[/color][/b]
- Added custom weapon for the usurpers sword using Urwy\'s Useless Resources Pack
- Changed Hulfarr and Brandir\'s journals to better represent skyrim lore
- Added several traps throughout the dungeon
- Changed Bandit Boss form Hard to Very Hard
[b][color=\"#FF0000\"]Version 1.4[/color][/b]
- Added markers for the puzzle room so it isn\'t as confusing. 

[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_bugs2.jpg[/img]

None Reported

[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_location2.jpg[/img]

Ravenbeak Barrow is located just below Stendarr\'s Beacon, cant miss it!

[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_videos2.jpg[/img]

None

[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_credits.jpg[/img]

Urwy for his excellent Useless Resources Pack located [color=white][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12087]here[/url][/color]

Big thanks to peterkeller, Vysh, and kemadevil for their feedback and helping me improve the mod!

[center][img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_endorse3.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p67/brodymonster/Photobucket%20Desktop%20-%20BRODY-PC/Skyrim_RBB/ravenbeak_endorse2.jpg[/img][/center]
author: tyranny
